ingredients.item: about 150g Arden & Amici Savoiardi Italian Sponge Fingers

instructions.step: In a large bowl, use electric beaters to whisk the egg yolks and caster sugar (about 5 minutes) until all the sugar has dissolved and the mixture is pale, fluffy and holds a trail for 3 seconds when you lift the beaters. Whisk in the mascarpone until smooth, followed by the chocolate spread and 25ml amaretto. Put the egg whites in a large, clean bowl with a pinch of salt. Use clean, dry beaters to whisk the egg whites until they form stiff peaks; carefully fold them into the mascarpone mixture.

Lightly crush Â½ the raspberries with the icing sugar; set aside. Put the sponge fingers in a layer in the base of a trifl e bowl (about 1.2 litres). Pour over the remaining 100ml amaretto then spoon the crushed berries and their juices on top, followed by the mascarpone mixture. Cover and chill for up to 24 hours (at least 2 hours).
Up to 2 hours before serving, whip the cream to soft peaks and spoon onto the trifl e. Decorate with the remaining raspberries, nuts and chocolate shavings.
